remarks: In a distributive lattice, joins distribute over meets.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dlatjmdi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dlatjmdi.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dlatjmdi.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dlatjmdi $p |- ( ( K e. DLat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( X .\/ ( Y ./\ Z ) ) = ( ( X .\/ Y ) ./\ ( X .\/ Z ) ) ) $.
